title: New: Minke – Armour
content:
Caught Minke’s debut set at Bushstock Festival over the weekend and as expected given the impact of her terrific first single, she played to a packed out room.

With Gold Angel released earlier this year clocking up an impressive 3 million Spotify streams to date, the highly anticipated follow-up doesn’t disappoint. Armour almost feels like the missing link between London Grammar and CHVRCHES, proving both vibrant and somehow tellingly fragile. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
